Rage: Gains +4 Strength, +4 Constitution, +2 Will and suffers -2 AC for 8 rd 6/dy
Tireless Rage: Suffers no fatigue after rage
Two-Handed Focus: +1 attack when using a weapon two-handed
Uncanny Dodge: Always adds Dexterity modifier to AC
